TopicTitle: MomaHawk Missile From Future Weapons and Missile Design

Articles.Content:
New missile I made and strapped on top of my plane. Its pretty long range. And has a ark that it follows into the ground. Would post craft files but I use the old c7 parts. The new one's are shiny to me. :/ Based on my flatwing design.
